author: reschke
msg: OAK-2655 - properly fail a createOrUpdate if there's a race condition we currently do not handle (WIP)

author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed code to prevent that two or more threads at startup run the same startup services (defined in serviceengine.xml using the startup-service element) more than once.
This will also prevent a deadlock condition (similar to the one fixed with rev. 1655046) that could occur at bootstrap under certain conditions and unlucky timing.
Thanks to Deepak Dixit and Ravi Lodhi for the report, tests and feedback.

author: coheigea
msg: Fairly large refactor - moving a lot of DOM functionality into "common" for re-use by other projects, who don't require the DOM module

author: rafabene
msg: Site checkin for project Apache DeltaSpike Documentation
